none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on December 09, 2023 Description from Terminal Escape:
 Folks, MOXIEBEAT are no doubt one of the most intense bands I've seen in the last decade. Or ever. These three young lads create an all encompassing wall of sound and energy and then manage to fold that wall around you before you even know you're trapped. Or maybe it's that you're being held. The Pop Sounds LP from 2020 is a thing of pure wonder, and now Stressors (released earlier this year) is just a reminder that....MOXIEBEAT are something truly special. STRESSORS
https://moxiebeat.bandcamp.com/

seo.title: Moxiebeat - Stressors EP - Terminal Escape
